entry.title: Lightning-dev Digest, Vol 27, Issue 2
entry.summary: Louis Willcock asks Rusty about his thoughts on why BIP70 isn't widely used, especially in reference to the BIP 70-72 collection. Rusty believes that the lack of adoption is due to the fact that it does not offer significant advantages over existing bitcoin addresses. In contrast, Lightning Network required a unique format which justified the creation of a dedicated format.
